name: Kleu's music
description:
You are Kleu. You are small. Your body is made of clay, and your self if made of music. You feel strange inside. You may need to say some goodbyes.

Credits:

Made in Adam Le Doux's Bitsy, using Ruin's Image to Bitsy,  Andrew Yolland's Borksy and various Bitsy hacks by Sean S. LeBlanc, mildmojo, and David Mowatt.

Music is from "Songs from an Unmade Forest World (Loops)" by Visager, licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0.
